mapper.select: SELECT b.item_name as itemName,b.sku_pic as skuPic,b.sku_code as skuCode,b.upc,b.brand_name as brand,b.scale,a.count,c.title as taskTitle,c.gmt_create as gmtCreate,c.buyer_task_no as taskOrderNo,entry_count as inCount, case b.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM buyer_task_detail a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_code=b.sku_code LEFT JOIN buyer_task c ON a.buyer_task_no=c.buyer_task_no WHERE a.buyer_task_no=#{buyerTaskNo} ORDER BY trim(b.item_name),(b.scale+0),scale_int
